name: Cube - Amiga
description:
Reminder, follow 8080 for notifications on updates !

Let's keep Amiga alive and prosper!

Most important is to have fun!

Your payment/tip is a contribution for my Amiga projects ;)
   

   


If you choose to support this game... Warning this is a prototype, I'm not sure how this will end !!!
   

    Cube

THIS IS RTG 1080p ONLY !!!! ;)


Upon waking up, you have no clue how you ended here

Can you escape?

You will hear screaming

and you will scream

 

Controls:

A,D rotate

W    forward

E      action

R      scream

 

Requirements:

AmigaOS3.x

AHI

1920x1080 RTG 24-bit

1000MIPS

???MB Free RAM

 

As usual don't expect a AAA game, it's done in AmiBlitz3

Both payed and demo files are same at this point !!!

Next version (not demo) will have a dev log
